                            <ul class="question-list">
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">When do I get a confirmation email?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>In most cases, you will receive this email along with the booking voucher (PDF file) within 30 minutes of you making the booking. Should you not receive it after this time, please check your junk mail and/or spam filters. You can also check your booking status by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Where can I check my booking details and status?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>You can check your booking status by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website. You may also access this information by signing in to your account via the self-service link in your confirmation email.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How do I know if my reservation is confirmed?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>In most cases, you will receive a confirmation email along with the booking voucher (PDF file) within 30 minutes of you making the booking. The booking voucher indicates that you have a confirmed booking with Agoda. Should you not receive it after this time, please check your junk mail and/or spam filters. You can also check your booking status by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Why is there no record at the hotel?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>All bookings are instantly confirmed. If the property has no record of your booking, please contact Agoda immediately. Our contact details are displayed on the booking voucher. Ask the property to call us directly and pass the phone to you or you can dial us yourself. Long distance charges may apply, but we will refund you for the cost of the call. All you need to do is provide us the receipt.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Why do I have to send my credit card information to Agoda? I didn’t receive my booking voucher.</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>We will occasionally send a request for additional documents as part of our credit card security procedure. This can happen at any time of the booking process, including after your booking has been confirmed. Once your documents have been received and reviewed, we will send you a confirmation email with the booking voucher attached. Any charges made to your card at this time will be subject to room availability and any outstanding balance. If the additional documents are not provided, your booking will automatically be cancelled. Please contact us if you have not received confirmation within 24 hours of your documents being submitted.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I change the name on my reservation?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Should you need to change the name of the reservation, you must contact Agoda as soon as possible. If you do not contact us to change the guest name, the property reserves the right to refuse check-in.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I check in without the booking voucher?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>If you do not present the property with your booking voucher and the credit card that you used to make the booking, you may experience problems checking in.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I have the official confirmation from the property for visa purposes?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Agoda will issue the booking voucher with your booking details as official confirmation. If your embassy does not accept this as proof for your visa application, you will need to contact the property directly for the property letter to guarantee your booking.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can you resend the booking voucher to me?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Agoda now provides you with a self-service option. Just by clicking on the self-service link provided in your confirmation email, you will be able to resend your booking voucher.
You can also resend your voucher by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How do I know that my documents have been received by Agoda?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>After you send the requested documents, we will send you an email confirming receipt within 24 hours.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">I don’t want to send my documents. Can I pay directly to the property?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>No. The rates listed on Agoda's website are only available through our service. Rates offered directly from the property are typically 10% to 50% higher. In addition, you benefit from Agoda Rewards Points that can be used for future bookings on any of the Agoda Special Rates - Pay online properties available through our website. We cannot guarantee either the rate or the availability of any booking you make directly with the property.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">I don’t want to send my documents. Can I show them directly to the property?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>No. Unfortunately, if we have requested additional documentation, we are unable to finalize your booking without these documents.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">I have submitted my booking and have not received my booking voucher.</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>In most cases, you will receive this email along with the booking voucher (PDF file) within 30 minutes of you making the booking. Should you not receive it after this time, please check your junk mail and/or spam filters. You can also check your booking status by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Is it safe to send my documents?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Agoda uses Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology to encrypt all information.

Please click  <a target="_blank" href="http://www.agoda.com/info/agoda_policies.html#2">http://www.agoda.com/info/agoda_policies.html#2</a>  for more information about our Shop Safe and Privacy Guarantee.

The link is secure and the information you provide will be reviewed by a trained member of our Fraud Prevention unit. This team ensures it’s really you making this booking.

This verification is for your protection.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">The website is telling me that I have a duplicate booking. How do I proceed?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>A duplicate booking will not be processed and charged unless you confirmed with us via phone/email that it is not an error. To avoid a duplicate booking status, please ensure that the names are the actual names of the guests checking in. A duplicate booking will occur when the lead guest name, the email address, room type booked, and the dates of stay matches or overlap.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What do I have to show to the property when I check in?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>You need to present:
- The booking voucher
- The same credit card used to make the booking
- A valid photo ID
If you have submitted additional documents or used PayPal to pay for your booking, then the credit card is not required.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is the booking voucher?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The booking voucher indicates you have a confirmed booking with Agoda. It is a PDF attachment sent to you at the time we sent you the confirmation email. It must be presented to the property at the time you check in. In most cases, you will receive this email along with the booking voucher (PDF file) within 30 minutes of you making the booking. Should you not receive it after this time, please check your junk mail and/or spam filters. You can also check your booking status by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What should I do if the credit card that I used to confirm the booking is invalid or has been cancelled?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>If your card has become invalid or has been cancelled, please contact us to avoid any problems upon check-in.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Where will my documents be stored after I have submitted them?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Agoda does not store your documents. As part of our commitment to your safety, we adhere to the PCI security standards council. For more information, please go to <a target="_blank" href="https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org">https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org</a>.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Why do I have to give my credit card information to Agoda by telephone?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Occasionally, we will call to confirm your details by telephone. This verification is part of our credit card security procedure. If the additional information is not provided, Agoda reserves the right to cancel the booking and refund any charges to the original credit card.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Why do I have to send my credit card information to Agoda? I have already received my booking voucher.</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Occasionally, we will send a request for additional documents. This verification is part of our credit card security procedure. If the additional information is not provided, Agoda reserves the right to cancel the booking and refund any charges to the original credit card. We will contact you within 24 hours of receiving your documents to confirm that your booking has been finalized. Please contact us if you have not received confirmation after that time.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                            </ul>
                        </section>
                        <section data-selenium="content-faqs">
                            <div class="header-category-default category-trigger">
                                <i id="plus" class="ficon ficon-plus-with-circle ficon-24"></i>
                                <i id="minus" class="ficon ficon-minus-with-circle ficon-24"></i>
                                <h3>General hotel information</h3>
                            </div>

                            <ul class="question-list">
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I add an extra bed/baby cot in my room?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Most properties allow children to stay in the room with parents either with or without an extra bed. The normal property policy is not to charge for children if they are under 12 years of age. Some properties will limit occupancy of a room to 2 adults and 1 child. Only a few will have existing bedding for additional children, so an extra bed is usually required and includes an additional charge. Usually properties will provide breakfast when there is a charge for an extra bed. However, this is dependent on each property's policies and procedures. A baby cot may be provided free of charge by some properties for children under the age of 2.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Where can I find the price of an extra bed?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>In instances where an extra bed is available for the selected room, the price will be displayed within the Room Type column on the Hotel page as well as the Room Information section on the Booking Form.<br>
* On the Hotel page (below the room name) click the ‘Need an extra bed?’ to see the cost of an extra bed per room per night.<br>
* On the Booking Form, click the Extra Beds link to select an extra bed. The cost will be displayed as an additional item within the pricing panel.<br></p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I cancel the New Year or Christmas Gala dinner?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>It is a common practice by hotels in Asia to include a Gala Dinner during the Christmas season as well as Western and Chinese New Years celebrations. These dinners are compulsory and cannot be cancelled.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Does the hotel provide airport transfer?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Unfortunately, agoda.com only provides a hotel reservation service. When making a search you can choose 'Hotel/Airport transfer' in the facilities section to help you with your search. Hotels will also provide this information in the "Useful Information" section on the hotel page displayed on the website. 

Some rooms come with complimentary airport transfer. If this is the case it will be specified in the room type or will be noted in the grand total on the booking form. 

Airport transfers are usually subject to a charge. If you would like to arrange airport transfer, please contact the hotel directly once you have received your confirmation email. Their direct telephone number will be listed on your hotel voucher. Alternatively you can send your request via self service special requests. The self service link is provided in your confirmation email.
                                     
You can also send your request by logging on to 'manage my bookings' via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Is breakfast included in the room rate?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>If breakfast is included, it will display "Breakfast Included" below the room type. If it is not mentioned, the hotel is not including breakfast with this room at this rate.  Breakfast availability is determined by the hotel. If you would like to inquire as to whether breakfast is available, we recommend that you contact the hotel upon check in.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I add breakfast to my room rate?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Yes, but there is usually an extra charge associated with this request. If breakfast is not included during the booking process you would need to contact the hotel directly. It is up to the hotel to determine if the displayed rate includes breakfast.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I choose all inclusive, full board, half board or additional meals?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Unfortunately, agoda.com only provides a hotel reservation service. Unless stated in the room type these are not available.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I choose what type of bed I want?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>On the booking form you can make your Special Request on the Room Details Page, where you complete the guest names and select the nationality. Please click on ""Special Requests (Optional)"" and then simply type in your request. The request will be sent to the hotel directly. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed by agoda.com. If available, your request will be confirmed upon arrival. 

If you wish to submit more requests, please check the Self Service LINK located in the confirmation email you will receive once your booking is complete.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I request a suite or hotel room with a kitchenette?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>While agoda.com certainly has hotel suppliers who offer suites and rooms with kitchenettes, we cannot limit our search to hotels that offer these types of rooms. If you prefer to have a suite or a kitchenette, we suggest you select a property and available room type with the required amenities. You can review the amenities offered by the hotel in the room details.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can the hotel store my luggage before check in or after check out?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Most hotels provide a luggage storing service both before check-in and after check-out either with or without a charge. Please check with the hotel receptionist upon arrival for more information regarding this procedure.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Does the hotel allow pets?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>When making a search you can choose 'Pets Allowed' in the facilities section to help you with your search. Hotels will also provide this information in the "Useful Information" section on the hotel page displayed on the website. </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Does the hotel charge for parking, gym, and sauna etc.?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Some hotels charge for these facilities while other hotels may give them as complimentary for their guests. This is subject to individual hotel policy. For more details, please contact the hotel directly.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How can I add an extra bed for my child?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The extra bed is compulsory for adults. If the 3rd person is a child under 12 years of age you have the choice to tick or untick the extra bed in the booking form after you have specified the child's age. </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How can I find out how many bedrooms are in an apartment?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Room details are displayed when you click on [Photo / Info] next to the room type selected.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How can I remove the extra bed?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The extra bed is compulsory for adults. If the 3rd person is a child under 12 years of age you have the choice to tick or untick the extra bed in the booking form after you have specified the child's age. </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How can I see all the different room types offered?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>On the hotel information page, click on 'Show more available room types' and the system will display all room types available at the hotel you have selected. If a certain room type you are looking for is not shown on the hotel page, it's not available for the dates you have selected.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How do I find out if a hotel has a certain facility or amenity?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>When making a search you can select from our listed choices in the facilities section to help you with your search. Hotels will also provide information in the "Useful Information" section on the hotel page displayed on the website. </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How do I find out if the hotel has parking facilities?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>When making a search you can choose 'Car Park' in the facilities section to help you with your search. Hotels will also provide this information in the "Useful Information" section on the hotel page displayed on the website. </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">I don’t want breakfast, can I remove this charge?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>For all room rates that are inclusive of breakfast, there will be no reduction in the rates should breakfast not be consumed. Agoda.com is not able to remove a breakfast charge.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Is breakfast included for my children?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>In those cases where breakfast is included in the room price, breakfast is not included for children when sharing a room with their parents without an extra bed. In such cases the hotel will charge for the child's breakfast directly. The breakfast is usually included in the extra bed rate.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Is there an additional charge for children when sharing a room with their parents?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Most hotels allow children to stay in the room with parents either with or without an extra bed. The normal hotel policy is not to charge for children if they are under twelve years of age. Some hotels will limit occupancy of a room to two adults and one child. Only a few hotels will have existing bedding for additional children, so an extra bed is usually required. Most hotels will charge for this extra bed. Usually hotels will provide breakfast when there is a charge for an extra bed. However, this is dependent on each property's policies and procedures. A baby cot may be provided free of charge, by some hotels, for children under the age of 2.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What does the hotel offer?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>For more information about your chosen hotel please check the hotel page under hotel features, hotel description and useful information.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is a Semi double room?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>This bed type is suitable for single occupancy as a Semi bed is smaller in size than a Standard bed. Most hotels in Japan offer this bed type.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is a Semi room?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>A Semi room type will mostly be provided by hotels in Japan. The size of the room is considered smaller than a standard room. A Semi room type category is suitable for single occupancy. </p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is a Triple room?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>A triple room would be suitable for three adults and there would be bedding arrangements to accommodate three people. This could be one double and one single bed or three single beds.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is the check in and check out time of the hotel?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Check-in time is normally from 14.00 hours. Check-out time is normally before 12.00 hours. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to room availability, cannot be guaranteed and are usually not free of charge.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is the difference between a Semi bed and a Single bed?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>This bed type is suitable for single occupancy as a Semi bed is smaller in size than a Standard bed. Most hotels in Japan offer this bed type.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What is the difference between a Single room, a Double room and a Twin room?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>A single room is designed for only one person. A double room is for double occupancy with either one double (king or queen size) or two single beds. A double room can also be used for single occupancy. A twin room is also for double occupancy but will have two single beds.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What kind of breakfast does the hotel provide?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The type of breakfast offered depends on each individual hotel. Agoda.com does not have access to this information.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">What type of bedding configuration does the room come with?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The room and its room type are guaranteed but the bed type is not. For example, a Superior room can come with one double (king or queen size) or two single beds. You can make a special request for the bed type but it is subject to availability upon arrival.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Where can I find the hotel contact number and address?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The hotel address will be shown on the hotel information page on our website. After the booking is confirmed, the hotel address and telephone number will be displayed on the hotel voucher. The address will also be shown in the hotels local language.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Where can I see the room details?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Room details are displayed when you click on [Photo / Info] next to the room type selected.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Why are the room types and bedding so different?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Room types vary from hotel to hotel however, hotels will generally have Standard, Deluxe, Superior, Club and Suite rooms. The main difference would be the room size and amenities. You can check for more information by clicking on [Photo / Info] next to the room type selected.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                            </ul>
                        </section>
                        <section data-selenium="content-faqs">
                            <div class="header-category-default category-trigger">
                                <i id="plus" class="ficon ficon-plus-with-circle ficon-24"></i>
                                <i id="minus" class="ficon ficon-minus-with-circle ficon-24"></i>
                                <h3>Cancel a booking</h3>
                            </div>

                            <ul class="question-list">
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Where can I find the cancellation policy?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>When searching for the room rate, booking conditions will be right under the room type description. To check further, you can also click on the "Book now" button which will direct you to the booking form. The cancellation policy/booking conditions link can be found in the middle of every page of the booking form. It will also be stated in the confirmation email we send you. If you cancel your booking via self-service, the cancellation policy will be shown again upon cancellation.
Note: Details and conditions in the cancellation policy will be different for each booking depending on the property, period of stay, room type, etc. Please read this carefully before submitting your booking.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Will I be charged if I cancel my reservation?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>The details and conditions of the cancellation policy will be different for each booking depending on the property, period of stay, room type, promotion, etc. 
When searching for the room rate, booking conditions will be right under the room type description. To check further, you can also click on the "Book now" button which will direct you to the booking form. The cancellation policy/booking conditions link can be found in the middle of every page of the booking form. It will also be stated in the confirmation email we send you. If you cancel your booking via self-service, the cancellation policy will be shown again upon cancellation.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">When will I get my refund?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Refunds, if applicable, will immediately be submitted to our bank. From the submission/refund date, banks generally take up to 10 business days to process the refund payment and transfer the funds into a customer's account. It is important to not that some banks can take between 15-30 days or until the next billing cycle. The refund should be converted to your local currency by your credit card company. How your reservation is processed will determine what shows on your card statement. However, your statement will ALWAYS show Agoda somewhere in the subject line.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How can I cancel my booking?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Agoda now provides you with a self service option. Just by clicking on the self-service link provided in your confirmation email, you will be able to cancel your booking.
You can also cancel your booking by signing in to "Manage my bookings" via the website.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How do I calculate the correct cancellation date?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>Cancellation policy dates are calculated based on the start of the day (local time), not check-in time.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">I made a booking using points and would like to cancel it or shorten my stay. Will my points be refunded?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>If you cancel a booking where your points were used, your points will be refunded upon cancellation. Points redeemed when purchasing a non-refundable booking will not be returned in case of cancellation. For shortened-stay bookings where Agoda needs to refund you the reduced amount of the booking value, the points you have used for the booking will be refunded first. If the amount to be refunded exceeds the value of the points you have used, you will be refunded in cash in addition to the points.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Why has a full period charge been applied?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>This is based on the property's cancellation policy. A full period charge often applies for bookings under promotion or high season. The policy can be different from one booking to another. When you submit the booking, please check the Booking Conditions underneath the room type and on the booking form.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                            </ul>
                        </section>
                        <section data-selenium="content-faqs">
                            <div class="header-category-default category-trigger">
                                <i id="plus" class="ficon ficon-plus-with-circle ficon-24"></i>
                                <i id="minus" class="ficon ficon-minus-with-circle ficon-24"></i>
                                <h3>Special requests</h3>
                            </div>

                            <ul class="question-list">
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How can I make a special request?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>You can make your special request on the Room Details page of the booking form. It is important to remember that all special requests are subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed by Agoda. If available, your request will be confirmed upon arrival. If you wish to submit more requests, you may use the Self Service link located in the confirmation email you will receive once your booking is complete or you can log into your Agoda account to manage your booking.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">How will I know if a special request is confirmed?</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">
                                            <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-answer ficon-18"></i>
                                            <p>All special requests are subject to availability and cannot be guaranteed by Agoda. Agoda will forward your request to your preferred hotel upon receipt and you must follow up with the hotel upon arrival.</p>
                                        </div>
                                    </li>
                                    <li class="question-default text-left">
                                        <i class="ficon ficon-noti-balloon-question ficon-18"></i> 
                                        <a class="question-trigger"  data-selected="false">Can I request for early check in/late check out?</a>

</a>

                                        <div class="answer show-more-component">

</p>
